attributes.action: UK Gov't & International Community to FREE PALESTINE from the chains of US Aid.
attributes.background: Donald Trump has threatened to cut aid for Palestinians not long after recognising Jerusalem as Israel's capital. I urge the UK & International Community to come together to provide the shortfall in funds to P.A.  Actions speak louder than words & clearly the US is biased in favour of the Israeli's.

rejection.details:
If you'd like the UK Government to increase the amount of aid it gives to Palestine, you could start a new petition calling for that.

You can find out about the UK Government's Palestinian Programme here:

https://www.gov.uk/world/organisations/dfid-opts

We can only accept petitions that call on the UK Government and Parliament to take action.
